Installation

Pi Installer

  1. Keyboard layout: English (UK)
  2. Please enter new username: <USER>
  3. Please set a password for <USER>: <NEW-USER-PASSWORD>
  4. Please confirm the password: <NEW-USER-PASSWORD-VERIFY>

Login & Reboot

  1. Login to the system:

    > <USER>
> <USER-PASSWORD>

  2. Set keymap (applied on next reboot):
    /etc/default/keyboard
    XKBMODEL="pc105"
XKBLAYOUT="us"
XKBVARIANT=""
XKBOPTIONS=""
BACKSPACE="guess"
  3. Reboot:

    $ reboot
